title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
cast: Keanu Reeves, Halle Berry, Ian McShane
notes: In this third installment of the adrenaline-fueled action franchise, skilled assassin John Wick (Keanu Reeves) returns with a $14 million price tag on his head and an army of bounty-hunting killers on his trail. After killing a member of the shadowy international assassin's guild, the High Table, John Wick is excommunicado, but the world's most ruthless hit men and women await his every turn.
mpaa: Rated R for pervasive strong violence, and some language.

title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
cast: Tom Hardy, Woody Harrelson, Michelle Williams
notes: Eddie Brock attempts to reignite his career by interviewing serial killer Cletus Kasady, who becomes the host of the symbiote Carnage and escapes prison after a failed execution.
mpaa: Rated PG-13 for intense sequences of violence and action, some strong language, disturbing material and suggestive references.

title: Us
cast: Lupita Nyong'o, Winston Duke, Elisabeth Moss
notes: A family's serene beach vacation turns to chaos when their doppelg√§ngers appear and begin to terrorize them.
mpaa: Rated R for violence/terror, and language.
